uk.co.caprica.vlcj.player.direct

Interface RenderCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectMediaPlayerComponent, RenderCallbackAdapter

    public interface RenderCallback
    Specification for a component that wishes to be called back to process video frames.

    The render call-back provides access to the native memory buffer, if instead the full RGB integer data is required for the full video frame then consider using RenderCallbackAdapter.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(DirectMediaPlayer mediaPlayer, com.sun.jna.Memory[] nativeBuffers, BufferFormat bufferFormat)
      Call-back when ready to display a video frame.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        void display(DirectMediaPlayer mediaPlayer,
           com.sun.jna.Memory[] nativeBuffers,
           BufferFormat bufferFormat)
        Call-back when ready to display a video frame.
        Parameters:
        mediaPlayer - media player to which the event relates
        nativeBuffers - video data for one frame
        bufferFormat - information about the format of the buffer used
